Hi There! \n\nIs this your first time playing the game?
Error. Please restart your game… Or check your internet connection
This is your points.\nYou earn points by finishing games or watching ad-videos.\nDo you want to watch an ad-video right now?

Users have the right to know what personal information/data we use and receive. 

Comma Dev is a small indie company that has to make use of functions/services offered by external providers/companies(Third Party Operators) to be successful in today's market. 

By playing/using this game, you confirm that your age is 13 or above and that you acknowledge our Terms and Conditions which incorporates our Privacy Policy.
A new update is out!\nYou can check it out now by clicking update or later by clicking later.
A new important update is out!\nYou have to update the app before you can play.
Press back once if you can\'t sign in.

Play Online 
Choose this option if you want to play against random players, in the same language as you, online. 


Play With Friends 
Choose this option if you want to create or join a game with friends or family. 
Only people with the room's name can join.

Create Game 

This option allows you to create a room with a special name. 

You can share this name with your friends or family and they will be able to join. 


Join Game 

This option allows you to join a room that one of your friends have created. 

They will share the unique name of the room with you and you will be able to join them.

Join Game 

You are required to insert the room's name into the box at the top. 

This is the special name that your friend gave you when they created a room. 

Please make sure to type it correctly, it is case sensitive.

Find Game 

Choose a language by pressing the button until your desired language is displayed. 

This language will be used in the game and you might not get points if you use a different language. 

Hit the play button and you will be connected to a random game with the same language.

Create Game 

You are required to insert the room's name into the box at the top. 

This is the special name that you give to your friends allowing them to join you. 

Please keep in mind that it is case sensitive.

Create Game 

Choose a game mode by pressing the button until your desired game mode is displayed. 

(If you want to know more about the different game modes, click the help button at the top of the screen) 

The selected language will be used in the game and you might not get points if you use a different language.

Solo Game 

Choose a game mode by pressing the button until your desired game mode is displayed. 

(If you want to know more about the different game modes, click the help button at the top of the screen) 

The selected language will be used in the game and you will get no points for words in different languages.

Relaxed Mode:\t Difficult letters(Q-V-W-X-Y-Z) are removed from the alphabet but no grace period is given after the first stop call. \n\nOriginal Mode:\t No letters are removed from the alphabet and no grace period is given after the first stop call.

Grace Mode:	 Difficult letters(Q-V-W-X-Y-Z) are removed from the alphabet and a 3 second grace period is given to players after the first stop call. 

Relaxed Mode:	 Difficult letters are removed from the alphabet but no grace period is given after the first stop call. 

Original Mode:	 No letters are removed from the alphabet and no grace period is given after the first stop call. 

Custom Mode:	 No letters are removed from the alphabet, but you choose what the subjects are. 
Name, Surname, Animal and Town can be changed to whatever you like.

Beginner Mode:	 Difficult letters(Q-V-W-X-Y-Z) are removed from the alphabet and the AI will type words very slowly - for beginners. 

Intermediate Mode:	 The AI is much improved and types words quickly - for intermediate players. 

Hard Mode:	 The AI is angry now, beatable, but angry. Good luck!

The aim of the game is to think of words that start with a certain, randomly generated, letter, faster than everybody else in the room. 

You'll need to think of a name, surname, animal and city/town that starts with the letter that will be displayed on your screen. 

To find out more about the different game modes, go to create game and click on the help icon.
Go check out Name Game on Google Play!
Please enter the number of rounds that you would like to play:
Text contains profanity. Please choose a different username.
Sorry, There is no more room in this game.

The solo game mode is still in development and as such you might not get credit for some words yet.

This is your avatar, you can buy new avatars with earnable points
This is your points balance. Play games to earn more points!
You can use this button to share the game with a friend
Solo games are great for learning the game while having fun
Create your own lobby that only friends can join with a secret lobby name
Allows you to play with anybody that is searching for a game
